RemediationStrings.Title: Device not in Azure Public Cloud
RemediationStrings.Description: This device must report azEnvironment = AzurePublicCloud via IMDS. If you're on VPN or a non-Microsoft host, move to your corporate Cloud PC or contact IT.

RemediationStrings.Title: Wrong Microsoft tenant detected
RemediationStrings.Description: IMDS tag 'tenantid' must be d980314b-cb2f-44e3-9ce7-06d7361ab382. Make sure you're using the company-issued Cloud PC. If this persists, contact IT.

RemediationStrings.Title: Unexpected device manufacturer
RemediationStrings.Description: SystemManufacturer must be 'Microsoft Corporation'. Use your Cloud PC or contact IT if this is a managed exception.

RemediationStrings.Title: Unexpected device product name
RemediationStrings.Description: SystemProductName must start with 'Cloud PC'. Ensure you're signed into your Cloud PC. Open Company Portal and tap Sync after switching.
